content: I want to learn to use lean to use it for formal proof writing (as a hobby). As such what would be best for me lean3 or lean4? Note that, I do have CS background, but my math background is not so solid.
The only big selling point of lean 3 now is the comprehensive maths library (which is WIP for lean 4) and it sounds like you don't need that so there's no reason not to go for lean 4
I think even if you want it with a maths library, lean4 is the right answer in almost all cases at this point.
Sabbir Rahman has marked this topic as resolved.
